Indian Institute of Science: The Indian Institute of Science (IISc) is a public, deemed, research university for higher education and research in science, engineering, design, and management. It is located in the southern Indian city of Bangalore, Karnataka. The institute was established in 1909 with active support from Jamsetji Tata and thus is also locally known as the "Tata Institute".[5] It is ranked among the most prestigious academic institutions in India[6] and has the highest citation-per-faculty among all the universities in the world.[7] It was granted a deemed university status in 1958 and recognized as an Institute of Eminence in 2018.[8]
